LLM counts extra pickups n drops the same way  as multiple stops  and are charged per stop. It's only a new mission if the customer actually pays the base fare again. The food-delivery-platform way is different bcoz the vendors pays full commission for each pickup.
=> if going for LLM mission count  dont pick multiple stops.

Every job u swipe is counted as 1 job order  be it multistop or single stop
